DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics BMS-986158 subject select advanced solid tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Study BMS-986158 Subjects With Select Advanced Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Must triple negative breast cancer , ovarian ( Serous histology expansion phase ) , small cell lung cancer , solid tumor Expected life expectancy least 3 month Men woman 18 year old old At least one measurable lesion baseline CT MRI per response evaluation criterion solid tumor ( RECIST ) v1.1 Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) 0 1 Serious uncontrolled medical disorder Concomitant second malignancy Uncontrolled significant cardiovascular disease Inadequate bone marrow function Other protocol define inclusion/exclusion criterion could apply
